general.long_summary:

Points clés :
• Des acteurs malveillants injectent des fausses informations dans les résultats de recherche IA
• Ces erreurs peuvent orienter les utilisateurs vers des contenus frauduleux ou dangereux

Les utilisateurs doivent rester vigilants et croiser les sources pour éviter les pièges de l’IA.
general.long_summary_en: Beyond mistakes or nonsense, deliberately bad information being injected into AI search summaries is leading people down potentially harmful paths.

image.long_summary_en:
Apatero Blog predicts a changing of the guard in AI image generation.

Key points:
• Flux 2 offers the best quality/speed/value balance in 2026
• The open-source ecosystem enables custom fine-tuning impossible elsewhere
• Midjourney remains the leader for artistic and aesthetic work
• DALL-E 3 via ChatGPT remains the most accessible for beginners

Market fragmentation means there's no clear winner: choice depends on use case.

Kani-TTS-2 offers a lean, high-performance alternative to […]
